name: Iterative Web App Developer
description: This plugin helps you develop web applications using an iterative approach. It guides you from initial concept to implementation with feedback loops at each step.

functionSpec.name: iterative_web_app_development
functionSpec.description: Iteratively develop a web application from an initial idea through planning to code generation, with feedback loops at each step.

app_idea.description: The initial app idea or concept to develop.

step.description: The current development step to execute.

feedback.description: Optional feedback to refine the output of the current step.

project_request.description: The finalized project request from a previous step.

project_rules.description: Technical constraints and rules for the project (tech stack, frameworks, etc.).

starter_template.description: Information about the starter template to use.

technical_specification.description: The technical specification from a previous step.

implementation_plan.description: The implementation plan from a previous step.

code_step_number.description: The implementation step number for code generation.

api_endpoint.description: The endpoint URL for the iterative prompt chain API

api_key.description: Your Anthropic API key (if not configured on the server)
